body:
# Zeebe
## Enhancements
### Broker
* Support Index State Management in OpenSearch exporter ([#13203](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13203))
### Gateway
* Gateway supports multi-tenancy in signal broadcast RPCs ([#14277](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14277))
### Java Client
* Provide the Java client's interfaces for migrating a process instance ([#15161](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15161))
* Support migrating a process instance from the Java client ([#14921](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14921))
* Java client supports multi-tenancy for BroadcastSignal RPC ([#13558](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13558))
### Go Client
* Go client commands allow specifying a `tenantId` / `tenantIds` property ([#15153](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15153))
* Add multi-tenancy support in the Zeebe Go client ([#14477](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14477))
* go-client: Job worker polling backoff mechanism ([#6150](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/6150))
### Misc
* Process instance migration supports multi-tenancy ([#15675](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15675))
* Revert: Migrate task instances with recreated event subscriptions ([#15659](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15659))
* Sync Process Instance Migration gRPC documentation with gateway.proto ([#15568](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15568))
* Migrate task instances with recreated event subscriptions ([#15407](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15407))
* Allow setting `scope` parameter for OAuth2 authentication ([#15391](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15391))
* Configure `identity-sdk` through `identity-spring-boot-starter` in the Gateway ([#15389](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15389))
* Add integration test to `MultiTenancyOverIdentityIT` test ([#15382](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15382))
* Support `UpdateJobTimeout` RPC in Go Client ([#15366](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15366))
* Support ElasticSearch 8.9+ ([#15306](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15306))
* Update `broker.yaml.template` and `broker.standalone.yaml.template` files in order to allow user to disable form exporting ([#15193](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15193))
* Export compensation subscription events ([#15140](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15140))
* Migrate task instances with variables ([#15114](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15114))
* Migrate service task instances (including jobs) ([#15113](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15113))
* Introduce new compensation subscription record ([#15063](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15063))
* Add Job Update Timeout intents ([#15034](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15034))
* I can execute a process with a compensation end event ([#14967](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14967))
* I can execute a process with an intermediate compensation throw event ([#14965](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14965))
* The record for a compensation event has the correct event type ([#14944](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14944))
* I can deploy a process with BPMN compensation event subprocesses ([#14943](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14943))
* I can deploy a process with BPMN compensation events ([#14942](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14942))
* I can model a process with compensation events via BPMN model API ([#14939](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14939))
* Add support to Java client for Form deletion ([#14858](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14858))
* Replace Dependabot with Renovate ([#14701](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14701))
* Use caching for Forms ([#14562](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14562))
* Support general-usage tenant-providing interceptor for SM ([#14285](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14285))
* Support multi-tenancy for Resource Deletion ([#14279](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14279))
* Support deletion of the Forms through DeleteResource gRPC ([#14272](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14272))
* Keep track of event types in the Engine ([#13433](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13433))
* Indicate the type of activated/completed/terminated catch events in Grafana ([#13410](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13410))
* Zeebe supports multi-tenancy for BPMN signal events ([#13336](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13336))
## Bug Fixes
### Broker
* Failed or cancelled topology change operations block further operations ([#15220](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15220))
* Topology received via gossip can bypass merge with locally persisted topology ([#15219](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15219))
* Potential inconsistency in raft after restoring from a backup ([#14509](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14509))
* Deleting a process definition only checks running instances and doesn't ignore banned instances ([#14465](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14465))
* Static user task assignee value treated as number (leads to an exception) ([#14109](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14109))
### Gateway
* Interceptor order is not respected ([#15677](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15677))
### Java Client
* ActivateJobsCommandImpl throws NullPointerException when ZeebeClientProperties.getDefaultJobWorkerName is null ([#14176](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14176))
### Misc
* After cancellation, a completed change operation should not overwrite updated topology ([#15726](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15726))
* Special characters in static inputs should not be escaped ([#15447](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15447))
* Verify correct behaviour of input mappings after bump to FEEL 1.17.3 ([#15445](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15445))
* NullPointerException when join is retried after a restart ([#15381](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15381))
* IT timeout due to `ScaleResiliencyTest.ScaleDown` ([#15343](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15343))
* Form events are not replayed ([#15194](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15194))
* Could not update new leader for partition ([#15188](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15188))
* Avoid executing process according to unprocessed commands referring to source process definition ([#15129](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15129))
* 8.3.x release benchmark - Authorization data unavailable: The Token can't be used before xxx ([#15047](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15047))
* A deployed form is not mentioned in the `DeploymentEventImpl.toString()` ([#14931](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14931))
* IOPS doubled in CW44 ([#14924](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14924))
* Improve resilience of remote stream restart ([#14884](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14884))
* UDP resource leaks ([#14837](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14837))
* Leaked message subscriptions cause constant processing load ([#14814](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14814))
* Job streams not aggregated correctly on gateway ([#14773](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14773))
* Job streams not registered on broker after some time ([#14771](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14771))
* IllegalStateException: found snapshot 0. A previous snapshot is most likely corrupted ([#14699](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14699))
* Regular OOM when replicating large state due to messaging timeouts ([#14663](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14663))
* MsgpackReaderException when reading TenantId ([#14624](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14624))
* NPE in `PendingMessageSubscriptionChecker` ([#14588](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14588))
*  NullPointerException: Cannot invoke `PartitionContext.getComponentHealthMonitor()` because `this.context` is null  ([#14458](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14458))
* Failed jobs are not reactivate after backoff ([#14329](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14329))
* Snapshot version of  benchmark application (starter/worker) doesn't work with SaaS ([#14047](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14047))
* Scheduled tasks should avoid overloading the streamprocessor ([#13870](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13870))
* EvaluateDecision request returns double quoted string ([#13551](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13551))
* Inconsistent/unnecessary escaping of characters in inputs ([#9859](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/9859))
* Feel error are causing bad user experiences ([#8938](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/8938))
## Maintenance
* Encode remote/job streaming errors as part of stream protocol ([#15195](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15195))
* Use consistent naming for command processors ([#15077](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15077))
* Add value type and intent labels to stream processing metrics ([#14925](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14925))
* Always use correct Identity version if `MultiTenancyOverIdentityIT` ([#14812](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14812))
* Cancelled partition startup should not be logged as error ([#14510](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14510))
* Expose API to make cluster topology changes ([#14462](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14462))
* Expose config via actuator and not logging ([#14398](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14398))
* Improve error message when multi-tenancy is enabled without identity ([#14374](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14374))
* Upgrade to Java 21 ([#13716](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13716))
## Documentation
* Add missing steps to developer handbook ([#15287](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/15287))
## Merged Pull Requests
* build(topology): add backward compatibility check for protobuf messages ([#15744](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/pull/15744))
* fix(topology): do not update the topology if the operation was cancelled ([#15727](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/pull/15727))
* fix(topology): maintain gossip state update ordering ([#15709](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/pull/15709))
* deps(github-tags): Update actions/upload-artifact action to v4 (main) ([#15629](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/pull/15629))
* fix(github): new project automation token for add-to-projects ([#15619](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/pull/15619))
* Revert "fix(github): use project admin token for project query" ([#15618](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/pull/15618))
* fix(github): fixed for add to projects workflow ([#15617](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/pull/15617))
* Handle job worker back pressure/yield as an expected case ([#15508](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/pull/15508))
* Fix the current ES dashboard ([#15390](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/pull/15390))
* fix: set correct generation ([#15341](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/pull/15341))
* Calculate the right versions ([#15340](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/pull/15340))
* refactor: allow easy disabling via secret removal ([#15317](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/pull/15317))
* Replay deployed forms ([#15201](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/pull/15201))
* Aa update ci after 8.3 minor release ([#14631](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/pull/14631))
* fix(clients/go): client does not retry on permanent errors ([#14217](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/pull/14217))
* [Backport stable/1.2] Fixes flakiness with the ElasticsearchExporter integration tests ([#8203](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/pull/8203))


# Operate
## 💊 Bugfixes
* **backend**: Extract IndexLifecycleManagementIT. Get rid of ArchiverITRepository ([#6083](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/6083))
* **backend**: Remove unused items ([#6078](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/6078))
* **backend**: Configure number of shards per index #5920 ([#6065](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/6065))
* **backend**: Workaround for search_after issue in OS java client (#5788) ([#6030](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/6030))

## 🧹 Chore
* update Zeebe and Identity to 8.4.0 ([#6135](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/6135))
* **deps**: bump com.amazonaws:aws-java-sdk-sts ([#6123](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/6123))

* **deps**: bump version.awssdk from 2.21.37 to 2.21.43 ([#6056](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/6056))
* Update Browserlist DB
* Update Browserlist DB

* **deps**: update dependency @loadable/component to v5.16.2 ([#6095](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/6095))
* **deps**: update dependency bpmn-js to v16 ([#6100](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/6100))
* **deps**: update actions/upload-artifact action to v4 ([#6098](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/6098))
* **deps**: update actions/setup-java action to v4 ([#5990](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/5990))
* **deps**: update dependency bpmn-moddle to v8.1.0 ([#6096](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/6096))
* **deps**: update dependency lint-staged to v15.2.0 ([#6012](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/6012))
* **deps**: update dependency bpmn-js to v15.2.2 ([#5946](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/5946))
* **deps**: update dependency @types/node to v20 ([#5689](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/5689))
* **deps**: update dependency node to v20.10.0 ([#5693](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/5693))
* **deps**: update dependency @carbon/react to v1.46.1 ([#5866](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/5866))
* **deps**: update dependency @carbon/elements to v11.36.0 ([#5865](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/5865))
* **deps**: update dependency prettier to v3.1.1 (master) ([#5870](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/5870))
* **deps**: update dependency mobx to v6.12.0 ([#5868](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/5868))
* bundle monaco-editor with project ([#6074](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/6074))
* update link to instance migration docs ([#6080](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/6080))
* **screenshots**: select process, minor refactoring ([#6079](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/6079))
* Update Browserlist DB
* **e2e**: add process instance migration tests ([#6062](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/6062))
* add screenshots for process instance migration ([#6053](https://github.com/camunda/operate/issues/6053))
* Update Browserlist DB

# Tasklist

## 🧹 Chore
* change dockerfile uid and gid ([#4220](https://github.com/camunda/tasklist/issues/4220))
* Bump form-js@1.6.3 ([#4222](https://github.com/camunda/tasklist/pull/4222))
* Revert release 8.4 automation commits for rebuild ([#4219](https://github.com/camunda/tasklist/issues/4219))
* update CHANGELOG.md


# Identity
## 🚀 New Features
* allow multiple root urls ([#2412](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2412))
* support custom client ids for camunda application ([#2406](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2406))
* add /ping endpoint for uptime check ([#2380](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2380))
* provider helper in sdk for authorization available ([#2379](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2379))
* add a helper to determine identity user search availability ([#2356](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2356))
* implement generic auth proile ([#2327](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2327))
* expose user groups via SDK ([#2303](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2303))
* add read:users permission to the Optimize role ([#2296](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2296))
* implement Azure AD sdk profile ([#2273](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2273))
* add support for AWS Aurora database ([#2266](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2266))
* implement identity spring boot starter ([#2184](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2184))
* add implementation info to jar ([#2148](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2148))
* support initializing access rules by config ([#2161](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2161))
* implement GET /authorizations endpoint ([#2109](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2109))

## 💊 Bugfixes
* fix resource authorizations checkbox style ([#2343](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2343))
* upgrade org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-security from 3.1.5 to 3.2.0 ([#2381](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2381))

* update dependency org.apache.logging.log4j:log4j-layout-template-json to v2.22.0 ([#2370](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2370))
* update dependency org.postgresql:postgresql to v42.7.0 ([#2371](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2371))

* update dependency axios to v1.6.2 ([#2354](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2354))
* update aws-java-sdk-v2 monorepo to v2.21.29 ([#2353](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2353))
* update dependency @carbon/react to v1.42.1 ([#2351](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2351))
* update aws-java-sdk-v2 monorepo ([#2350](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2350))
* upgrade software.amazon.awssdk:rds from 2.21.21 to 2.21.26 ([#2332](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2332))
* update dependency @carbon/themes to v11.27.0 ([#2318](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2318))
* update dependency i18next-browser-languagedetector to v7.2.0 ([#2319](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2319))

* update aws-java-sdk-v2 monorepo to v2.21.20 ([#2307](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2307))

* update dependency @carbon/react to v1.41.2 ([#2301](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2301))
* update aws-java-sdk-v2 monorepo to v2.21.17 ([#2300](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2300))

* upgrade software.amazon.awssdk:rds from 2.21.13 to 2.21.15 ([#2274](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2274))

* update dependency @carbon/react to v1.41.1 ([#2247](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2247))
* update spring boot to v3.1.5 ([#2227](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2227))

* update dependency @carbon/react to v1.40.0 ([#2103](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2103))
* management-api/pom.xml to reduce vulnerabilities ([#2133](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2133))

* **ingress-annotation**: Update helm chart version for preview env ingress ([#2419](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2419))

* update dependency org.springframework.security:spring-security-test to v6.2.0 ([#2360](https://github.com/camunda-cloud/identity/issues/2360))
